pages.text: wa'iidha qil lhwla' almnafqyn: aqblu taybyn metdhryn emma badr minkum min syiy alqawl wsfh alhdyth, yastaghfir lakum rasul allah wysal allah lakum almaghfirat walefw ean dhnwbkm, amalu rwwshm whrkwha asthza'an wastkbarana, wabsrthm -ayha alrswl- yueradun enk, wahum mustakbirun ean alamtthal lamaa tulib mnhm
